songs.title: CHOPPA
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ayy, ayy

[Chorus: Lil Pump]
One choppa, two choppa, three choppa, four (goddamn)
Bitch I'm Lil Pump and I just fucked your hoe (brr)
Hunnid on my wrist, Balenciagas on my toes (goddamn)
I'm flexing everyday, call me Lil Pump D Rose (D Rose)

[Verse 1: Lil Pump]
I just fucked your teacher now I'm fuckin' on your sis (your sis)
My diamonds look like Fiji water, I just took a piss (brr)
Took a flight to Cali yeah I'm smoking cannabis (that gas)
Extended grip on my shoes and spend it on my wrist (my wrist)

[Chorus: Lil Pump]
One choppa, two choppa, three choppa, four (goddamn)
Bitch Im Lil Pump and I just fucked your hoe (brr)
Hunnid on my wrist, Balenciagas on my toes (goddamn)
Im flexing everyday, call me Lil Pump D Rose (D Rose)

[Verse 2: Danyante]
One choppa, two choppa, three choppa, four (yeah)
I just fucked your bitch and then I pass her to my bro (goddamn)
Bitch I is Danyante, I'm hittin' stains faneto (skrt, skrt)
Thirty on me nigga, if they come I make 'em go
Cuz nigga I'm totin' pistols, facts
Got the AK on my back (huh)
Juggin' plugs just for the racks (racks)
Test me, stab you in yo' back
Bitch I'm chasin' money sacks
I can't sit here, can't relax
Got my niggas they attack, since elementary sellin' crack
Yeah bih, thats facts

I been sellin' crack, junkies waitin' for me at the door
Oh you want some beef with me? That shit never seen before
Yes I did finesse nigga, and ima go finesse some more
If you tryna cop some shit, man I'm the plug just let me know
All these bitches on me man they tryna have my fuckin' phone (stupid ass bitch)
But I cannot do it nigga, cannot waste time with these hoes
When recordin' shit, yeah all them fours bitch yes I gotta pour
If yo' nigga acts so tough leave him on the muhfuckin' floor, nigga

[Chorus: Lil Pump]
One choppa, two choppa, three choppa, four (goddamn)
Bitch I'm Lil Pump and I just fucked your hoe (brr)
Hunnid on my wrist, Balenciagas on my toes (goddamn)
I'm flexing everyday, call me Lil Pump D Rose (D Rose)

[Outro: Danyante]
Yuh, esketit nigga, you know what the fuck goin' on
Follow me on IG nigga, danyante s-k-r-t (danyanteskrt)
You feel me, danyanteskrt nigga, you know what the fuck goin' on (pih, pih)
Im next up
Fuck (skrrt)
